description:
1. Exact version of Nova/OpenStack you are running:
root@yindesheng:/home/nova# git log -1
commit 859ff4893f699b680fec4db7dedd3bec8c8d0a1c
Merge: 4022d57 fb6f37f
Author: Jenkins <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Mar 11 17:46:00 2016 +0000

    Merge "Fix pre_live_migration result processing from legacy computes"

2. Relevant log files:
root@yindesheng:/home/nova# tox -v
using tox.ini: /home/nova/tox.ini
using tox-2.3.1 from /usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tox/__init__.pyc
py34 create: /home/nova/.tox/py34
ERROR: InterpreterNotFound: python3.4
py27 create: /home/nova/.tox/py27
  /home/nova/.tox$ /usr/bin/python -m virtualenv --python /usr/bin/python2.7 py27 >/home/nova/.tox/py27/log/py27-0.log
py27 installdeps: -r/home/nova/test-requirements.txt
  /home/nova$ /home/nova/.tox/py27/bin/pip install -chttps://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/requirements/plain/upper-constraints.txt -r/home/nova/test-requirements.txt >/home/nova/.tox/py27/log/py27-1.log
ERROR: invocation failed (exit code 2), logfile: /home/nova/.tox/py27/log/py27-1.log
ERROR: actionid: py27
msg: getenv
cmdargs: [local('/home/nova/.tox/py27/bin/pip'), 'install', '-chttps://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/requirements/plain/upper-constraints.txt', '-r/home/nova/test-requirements.txt']

title: Execute the tox command failed

comments.content: What version of pip do you have? Is it the latest?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
/home/nova/.tox/py27/bin/pip is not latest.

[root@yindesheng nova]# /home/nova/.tox/py27/bin/pip install -chttps://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/requirements/plain/upper-constraints.txt

  pip install [options] <requirement specifier> ...
  pip install [options] -r <requirements file> ...
  pip install [options] [-e] <vcs project url> ...
  pip install [options] [-e] <local project path> ...
  pip install [options] <archive url/path> ...

comments.content:
My virtualenv is too old, upgrade it.
Now pip can work.
This is a invalid bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hanrong
